verses.text: Deliver me, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, from evil men. Preserve me from violent men:

those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* devise \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hearts. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w continually|strong="H3068"\w* gather \w themselves|strong="H7451"\w* together \w for|strong="H3068"\w* war.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* sharpened \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tongues \w like|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* serpent. Viper’s poison \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w under|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* lips. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, keep \w me|strong="H8478"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* hands \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w wicked|strong="H8478"\w*. Preserve \w me|strong="H8478"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* violent men who \w have|strong="H8193"\w* determined \w to|strong="H2534"\w* trip \w my|strong="H8478"\w* feet.

\w The|strong="H8104"\w* proud \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w hidden|strong="H5341"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snare \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* spread \w the|strong="H8104"\w* cords \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* net \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* path. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* set traps \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* said \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H6566"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*.” Listen \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* cry \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H6566"\w* petitions, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* strength \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation, \w you|strong="H6963"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* covered \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* battle.

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, don’t grant \w the|strong="H3069"\w* desires \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* wicked. Don’t let \w their|strong="H3117"\w* evil plans succeed, \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* become proud. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* head \w of|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* surround \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* mischief \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own lips cover \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.
Let burning coals fall \w on|strong="H7218"\w* them. Let them \w be|strong="H8193"\w* thrown into \w the|strong="H3680"\w* fire, into miry pits, \w from|strong="H8193"\w* where they never rise.

\w An|strong="H6965"\w* evil speaker won’t \w be|strong="H1077"\w* \w established|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth. Evil \w will|strong="H5307"\w* hunt \w the|strong="H5921"\w* violent \w man|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w overthrow|strong="H5307"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3559"\w* know \w that|strong="H7451"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3956"\w* \w maintain|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* cause \w of|strong="H3956"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* afflicted, \w and|strong="H2555"\w* justice \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* needy.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* righteous \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H6213"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* upright \w will|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* presence.
